data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grubbs, Scott A. (2008): Allocapnia tsalagi, sp. n. and notes on A. recta (Claassen) from the Cumberland Plateau region of northeastern Alabama, U. S. A. Zootaxa 1754: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181778
